about.subTitel: Saving lives in Egypt by making finding donors as easy as searching on Google.
about.p1: An Egyptian young man from Fayoum Governorate seeks to provide something beautiful and simple for his country and its people by helping those in need of blood to find blood donors quickly and easily in their area.?
about.p2: How many times has someone called you to tell you that they need you to donate blood? Or how many posts have you come across on Facebook where they ask for blood donors? I am sure that it has happened to you many times, just as it happened to me personally, to the extent that it can be said that finding blood donors has become difficult and a problem for many, and sometimes it can be a problem of life or death, this thing has always pushed me to find a solution to it, so I hope you will This platform is the solution?
about.p3: Simple, finding blood will not be a problem in Egypt, need blood donors? A quick search on this platform gives you access to thousands of donors near you?
about.help: Help us help those in need of blood
about.p4: The best way to help is of course to register as a blood donor, if you can't do that you can always help by sharing this site on social media.

banner.title: Your Donation Of Blood May Save Someone's Life!
banner.paragraph: Donating Blood Helps Save a Million Lives Every Year, Because This Donation Also Includes Platelets, Plasma, and Even Placental Blood.

donationprocess.title: Donation Process
donationprocess.paragraph: The donation process from the time you arrive center until the time you leave
donationprocess.p1: You need to complete a very simple registration form. Which contains all required contact information to enter in the donation process
donationprocess.p2: A drop of blood from your finger will take for simple test to ensure that your blood iron levels are proper enough for donation process.
donationprocess.p3: After ensuring and passed screening test successfully you will be directed to a donor bed for donation. It will take only 6-10 minutes.

healthbenefits.title: Health Benefits When Donating Blood
healthbenefits.p1: Donating blood not only improves the life of the recipient but also helps the donor to stay healthy.
healthbenefits.p6: Reducing The Risk Of Heart Attacks

contact.p: This page is to make your communication with us fast in all ways
